title: Vikram
blurb: Lightweight job runner & queue for reproducible pipelines. Files in, results out. Local or SSH workers.
description: Vikram is a simple, file-first work-queue and task runner for batch processing and ETL-like pipelines. Define steps as small commands with clear inputs/outputs, and Vikram will discover sources, schedule work with safe concurrency, retry transient failures, and materialize deterministic artifacts with checksums. It can run locally or dispatch tasks over SSH to a handful of worker nodes â€” without a heavyweight message broker.

versions.notes: SSH worker pools, resumable checkpoints, structured JSON logs.
Deterministic artifact manifests and named locks.
Local runner with YAML/TOML recipes and basic retries.
